text:
Viceroy Riviera Maya’s ‘Aphrodisiac Shower Experience’Is the Ultimate in Romance and Sensuality Published on : Friday, August 7, 2015
Showering together has never been so romantic. The Viceroy Riviera Maya has introduced an ‘Aphrodisiac Shower Experience’ that is the ultimate in sensuality, amorously enjoyed outdoors in the private garden of your villa.
Setting the evocative scene and creating the inspired mood are:
A ring of candles encircling the outdoor shower; A choice of aphrodisiac soaps including Invigorating and Sweet Chocolate, Deep Red Wine, and Uplifting and Engaging Honey & Lavender (made with natural honey from the resort’s hive of stingless melipona bees); Glove loofahs; Rose petals strewn in the shower; Aromatherapy diffusers with Red Apple Essence strategically positioned in your villa; Aphrodisiac massage oil, in chocolate, strawberry or vanilla scent; Aphrodisiac truffles in red wine, chile, pomegranate and vanilla flavors; Seductive Watermelon Martinis.
“Each of our 41 villas has an outdoor shower in a lush private garden that is the ideal setting for the Aphrodisiac Shower Experience,” explained General Manager Pedro Lara. “Sexy and indulgent, it’s the most romantic and sensual amenity that a resort can offer lovers.”
Viceroy Riviera Maya is an all-villa, adults-only resort (guests must be at least 16 years old) that is a chic, ultra-luxurious getaway for a romantic interlude or a honeymoon. The spacious, exquisitely appointed villas, each with its own private patio and plunge pool, are ideal for an intimate and private couples’ escape.
The resort’s ‘Plunge Pool Romantic Turndown’ gives a whole new meaning to how romantic a turndown can really be. Viceroy Riviera Maya is known for its one-of-a-kind Soap Concierge who provides guests with fresh artisanal soaps in the scent and aromatherapy experience of their choice, and this unique service now has been taken to a new level with the soaps created for the Aphrodisiac Shower Experience.
The Aphrodisiac Shower Experience is $99.
The Viceroy Riviera Maya is a serene all-villa hideaway where guests experience true relaxation, gracious villa living, exquisite dining, personalized pampering, healing spa treatments and much more in a stunning ambiance combining lush jungle with a sugary-white-sand beach lapped by the warm turquoise waters of the Caribbean.
The 41 villas offer luxury, privacy and generous indoor and outdoor living space – for a perfect vacation escape. They feature an array of elegant and comfortable appointments including a terrace with lounge chairs, table and private plunge pool, plush 500-thread-count linens, oversize shower plus a private outdoor shower, dual sinks, spacious closets, Nespresso coffee maker, Bose radio with iPod dock, HDTV and DVD player.
Among the delights of a getaway to the Viceroy Riviera Maya are refined Mexican cuisine accented with international influences at La Marea, Mexican-Mediterranean dishes cooked on wood-burning grills at the seaside Coral Grill, a palm-ringed lagoon pool, fitness center, day beds at the beach, and a pier where guests enjoy massages, romantic dinners and are conveniently picked up by boat for snorkeling, diving and other excursions. The resort is located 35 minutes from Cancun International Airport, and three miles from the restaurants, boutiques and nightlife of popular Playa del Carmen.
Source:- Viceroy Hotel
